channel.title: Fastest double bass you've ever heard in a song?
channel.description:
the fastest double bass ive ever heard in a song was 322 or so (My Fears Have Become Phobias - As Blood Runs Black)
whats the fastest you've ever heard?? comment beloww please

item.title: Fastest double bass you've ever heard in a song?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Probably a Shadow’s Fall song.

item.title: Fastest double bass you've ever heard in a song?
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:14, topic:443924"][quote author=202685 link=topic=546607.msg4007921#msg4007921 date=1338851828]

Do you call that ‘music’?

and u fags call rap ‘music’ ???
[/quote]
I don’t listen to rap.

well i was just asuming u listened to rap, because most people who hate on metal listen to rap

There are a lot more genres than rap and metal, sir.[/quote]
You don’t listen to rap? You’re cool in my books

Do you call that ‘music’?

well i suppose if you’re deaf or have no idea of the talent needed to produce, then i suppose not.
[/quote]being an idiot requires a certain talent too, doesn’t mean it’s ‘good’ to be an idiot.[/quote]
being able to not distinguish between ‘good’, which is subjective, and music in general is also a talent.
